title: Oysters Rockefeller
ingredients: ['2 rashers streaky bacon', '24 unopened, fresh medium oysters', '275g (10 oz) cooked spinach', '5 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '3 spring onions, chopped', 'handful chopped fresh parsley', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 dash hot pepper sauce, such as Tabasco', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon Pernod', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) coarse sea salt']
